Tool

NameImport Image (bmp, jpg, png, tif, gif, pnm, xpm)
ID1
Author(c) 2005 by O.Conrad

Description

Loads an image.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Output
Image (*)Data Object (optional output)OUT_GRID
Image (Red Channel) (*)Data Object (optional output)OUT_RED
Image (Green Channel) (*)Data Object (optional output)OUT_GREEN
Image (Blue Channel) (*)Data Object (optional output)OUT_BLUE
Options
Image FileFile pathFILE
OptionsChoiceMETHODAvailable Choices: [0] Standard [1] Split Channels [2] Enforce True Color Default: 2
(*) optional
